text:
Hello everyone,

I’d like to create a workflow with trigger ‘Address was filled via HubSpot Insight AI’ or company was created automatically because a contact was created (based on corresponding <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/crm-setup/automatically-create-and-associate-companies-with-contacts|HubSpot feature>).

Does anyone have a clue to achieve this?

The reason is that the address is often filled incorrectly. So in above cases, I ’d like to send an email to our data quality managers.
